body:
Hi. Some people on here might already have an idea of who I am. Indeed, I'm from the Overcast Network (tell me if you want me to remove this part aka. if it's considered advertising.).
In most of my spare time, I'll make maps or play on PVP servers such as avicus.
I'm also a ref for OCN and I'm proud to be one.

Ask me anything ;)
